message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its unique value proposition, I'm initially proposing a price of $2,000,000. I'm confident we can find a mutually beneficial arrangement.
I appreciate the opportunity to purchase the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,400,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, thanks for your interest and counter-offer. I understand your perspective on the value.  To be fair to both of us, I could meet you halfway between our two offers. How about $1,700,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,500,000. I'm trying to be reasonable, but I have to make sure it's a good deal for me.
